CustomField.description: Field to summarise changes you've made to the narrative following the peer review. Any changes should be made within the narrative itself (i.e. you should overwrite where applicable). You can also outline here why you've not made a change suggested in the peer review plus your reasoning.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to summarise changes you've made to the narrative following the peer review. Any changes should be made within the narrative itself (i.e. you should overwrite where applicable). You can also outline here why you've not made a change suggested in the peer review plus your reasoning.
CustomField.label: Notes
